title: TRIUMPH EXCLUSIVE RATES
short_desc: Look no further. You’ve earned the lowest rate possible. As a member, we’ll treat you to an exclusive rate of up to 25% when you book online or over the phone. Enjoy the best available rate, exclusively for you.
long_desc:
Look no further, you've just found the lowest rate possible.

Evelyn members receive the Triumph Exclusive rate at our hotel, which is 25% off the best available rate. By booking directly with our hotel, you're always guaranteed to enjoy the lowest possible rate. Don't think about rates, just think about the adventures you'll create.

Book directly online or call us at (212) 545-8000 for this Members Only exclusive rate.
page_title: Triumph Exclusive | NoMad Hotel | The Evelyn
